effects.display_string:
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Wildfire Bomb by 3% stacking up to 6 times. 
Wildfire Bomb has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Mongoose Bite deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of the Midnight Soiree

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 9,058 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Alliance Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Alliance.
